price: (Yaa Muhammad!) Yoo si sobsiisan, ergamtoonni si duraas (akkuma kee) sobsiifamanii jiru. Dhimmoonni hundi gara Rabbiitti deebifamu.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
